moduleMeta.name: K_cali_for_Freezing_Thawing
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: calibration of soil hydraulic conductivity through daily air temperature

var.name: tmean2D
var.description: daily mean air temperature at each grid of the study area

var.name: ksat3D
var.description: saturated hydraulic conductivity of each soil layer at each grid of the study area
